description:
Versatile overalls that are up for living life on the rugged side. Cut for movement with a gusseted crotch and articulated knees, they are a natural pick for frontcountry or urban adventures.

  • Burly nylon with a bit of stretch stands up to camp life
  • 2 front hand pockets, 2 back pockets and a chest patch pocket
  • Gusseted crotch and articulated knees give you room to move
  • PFC-free DWR finish sheds mist and mud
  • Fair Trade Certified. Your purchase of this item supports better working conditions for the factory workers who made it. For each product sold, they earn a premium to increase their earnings and fight poverty in their communities
name: MEC Burly Camp Overalls - Women's
